short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple day-to-day notes to keep track of your daily activity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple note taking application that automatically deletes your oldest notes.
The app is perfect for individuals working in fast paced environments, where you have to remember a lot of info from one day to the next, but is in no way meant as a long-term storage solution.

You can store up to 6 notes of 1000 characters each.
When a 7th note is added, your oldest note will automatically be deleted.
